info.name: Line Fight
info.attribution: The game layout, cards, and library image were created by an anonymous person who gave the work to virtualtabletop.io. Virtualtabletop.io releases all of this to the Public Domain under CC0.
info.description: Compete in rows and columns, increasing your score while destroying your opponents.
info.similarAwards:
2013 Hungarian Board Game Award Nominee
2012 Juego del Año Finalist
2002 Origins Awards Best Abstract Board Game Winner
2002 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Foreign Game for Beginners Nominee
info.ruleText: Use the "Rules overview link" above to learn the game. All iconography modifications from the original rules are explained below.
info.helpText:
ICONOGRAPHY
The original game's castles have been replaced by circular discs which show a value from 1 to 3. 

SPECIAL TILES
This implementation uses the following icons for each special tile:
  • Fire - All positive values in Fire's row and column are considered to be 0. All negative values are unaffected.
  • x2 - All values in the x2's row and column are doubled.
  • Rock - Each Rock splits its row and column into two rows and columns with regard to all scoring effects.

SCORING
The scoring value of each row and column is automatically calculated. These values are shown on each side of the row or column. They account for all special tiles, and with Rocks they show separate values for each side of that Rock tile.

When modifying your score, click the "edit points" button and input the score change.

You may use the small blue pawn to track the row and column that is currently being scored.

ALERT SETTINGS
At the start of your turn you will hear a soft sound and see a text alert on screen. Clicking anywhere on the screen will remove the text alert. If you do not want to hear the sound and/or see the text alert when it is your turn, click the "Turn Settings" button in the bottom left corner and change your preferences.
